description: Creates an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline. For more information, see Creating Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion pipelines.

parameters.name: PipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline to create. Pipeline names are unique across the pipelines owned by an account within an Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: MinUnits
parameters.description: The minimum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

parameters.name: MaxUnits
parameters.description: The maximum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

parameters.name: PipelineConfigurationBody
parameters.description: The pipeline configuration in YAML format. The command accepts the pipeline configuration as a string or within a .yaml file. If you provide the configuration as a string, each new line must be escaped with \n.

parameters.name: LogPublishingOptions
parameters.description: Key-value pairs to configure log publishing. IsLoggingEnabled (boolean) --- Whether logs should be published. CloudWatchLogDestination (dict) --- The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. This parameter is required if IsLoggingEnabled is set to true. The name of the CloudWatch Logs group to send pipeline logs to. You can specify an existing log group or create a new one. For example, /aws/vendedlogs/OpenSearchService/pipelines.

nested_params.name: CloudWatchLogDestination
nested_params.description: The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. This parameter is required if IsLoggingEnabled is set to true.

nested_params.name: LogGroup
nested_params.description: The name of the CloudWatch Logs group to send pipeline logs to. You can specify an existing log group or create a new one. For example, /aws/vendedlogs/OpenSearchService/pipelines.

parameters.name: VpcOptions
parameters.description: Container for the values required to configure VPC access for the pipeline. If you don't specify these values, OpenSearch Ingestion creates the pipeline with a public endpoint. A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint. (string) --- SecurityGroupIds (list) --- A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint. (string) --- VpcAttachmentOptions (dict) --- Options for attaching a VPC to a pipeline. Whether a VPC is attached to the pipeline. CidrBlock (string) --- The CIDR block to be reserved for OpenSearch Ingestion to create elastic network interfaces (ENIs). VpcEndpointManagement (string) --- Defines whether you or Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion service create and manage the VPC endpoint configured for the pipeline.

nested_params.name: SubnetIds
nested_params.description: A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint.

nested_params.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_params.description: A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint.

nested_params.name: VpcAttachmentOptions
nested_params.description: Options for attaching a VPC to a pipeline.

nested_params.name: AttachToVpc
nested_params.description: Whether a VPC is attached to the pipeline.

nested_params.name: CidrBlock
nested_params.description: The CIDR block to be reserved for OpenSearch Ingestion to create elastic network interfaces (ENIs).

nested_params.name: VpcEndpointManagement
nested_params.description: Defines whether you or Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion service create and manage the VPC endpoint configured for the pipeline.

parameters.name: BufferOptions
parameters.description: Key-value pairs to configure persistent buffering for the pipeline. Whether persistent buffering should be enabled.

nested_params.name: PersistentBufferEnabled
nested_params.description: Whether persistent buffering should be enabled.

parameters.name: EncryptionAtRestOptions
parameters.description: Key-value pairs to configure encryption for data that is written to a persistent buffer. The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt buffer data. By default, data is encrypted using an Amazon Web Services owned key.

nested_params.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt buffer data. By default, data is encrypted using an Amazon Web Services owned key.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: List of tags to add to the pipeline upon creation. (dict) --- A tag (key-value pair) for an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline. The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the pipeline to which they are attached. The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the pipeline to which they are attached.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.

nested_items.name: PipelineName
nested_items.description: The name of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: PipelineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: MinUnits
nested_items.description: The minimum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

nested_items.name: MaxUnits
nested_items.description: The maximum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of why a pipeline has a certain status.

nested_items.name: PipelineConfigurationBody
nested_items.description: The Data Prepper pipeline configuration in YAML format.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the pipeline was last updated.

nested_items.name: IngestEndpointUrls
nested_items.description: The ingestion endpoints for the pipeline, which you can send data to.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LogPublishingOptions
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that represent log publishing settings.

nested_items.name: IsLoggingEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether logs should be published.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogDestination
nested_items.description: The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. This parameter is required if IsLoggingEnabled is set to true.

nested_items.name: LogGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch Logs group to send pipeline logs to. You can specify an existing log group or create a new one. For example, /aws/vendedlogs/OpenSearchService/pipelines.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpoints
nested_items.description: The VPC interface endpoints that have access to the pipeline.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID for your VPC. Amazon Web Services PrivateLink generates this value when you create a VPC.

nested_items.name: VpcOptions
nested_items.description: Information about the VPC, including associated subnets and security groups.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VpcAttachmentOptions
nested_items.description: Options for attaching a VPC to a pipeline.

nested_items.name: AttachToVpc
nested_items.description: Whether a VPC is attached to the pipeline.

nested_items.name: CidrBlock
nested_items.description: The CIDR block to be reserved for OpenSearch Ingestion to create elastic network interfaces (ENIs).

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointManagement
nested_items.description: Defines whether you or Amazon OpenSearch Ingestion service create and manage the VPC endpoint configured for the pipeline.

nested_items.name: BufferOptions
nested_items.description: Options that specify the configuration of a persistent buffer. To configure how OpenSearch Ingestion encrypts this data, set the EncryptionAtRestOptions. For more information, see Persistent buffering.

nested_items.name: PersistentBufferEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether persistent buffering should be enabled.

nested_items.name: EncryptionAtRestOptions
nested_items.description: Options to control how OpenSearch encrypts buffer data.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt buffer data. By default, data is encrypted using an Amazon Web Services owned key.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointService
nested_items.description: The VPC endpoint service name for the pipeline.

nested_items.name: ServiceVpcEndpoints
nested_items.description: A list of VPC endpoints that OpenSearch Ingestion has created to other Amazon Web Services services.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service for which a VPC endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: VpcEndpointId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the VPC endpoint that was created.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: Destinations to which the pipeline writes data.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service receiving data from the pipeline.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint receiving data from the pipeline.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags associated with the given pipeline.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the pipeline to which they are attached.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.
